[GAME]

ll If you desperately need to steal something - you've come to the right place. 
In a city full of dangers, there is only one person who is able to perform the 
most complex order. In comparison, the cruel Baron Nortkrest pale and his 
greedy guardian, the mysterious Queen beggars ardent revolutionaries and 
street dwellers "bottom". His name is Garrett, and he has mastered the art 
of breaking and entering. Plague, war, fighting ... let the rest tremble - and
he will steal!

Imperishable classic returns. A brand new game from the studio Eidos-MontrÃƒÂ©al, 
given the fans an excellent Deus Ex: Human Revolution, revives the best traditions 
of the legendary series Thief. Can you become Master thief and survive on the 
dark streets of the city, where the blood on the streets - as common as gold 
coins in chests almighty Baron? 


[FEATURES]

ll Path Master thief: the unthinkable robbery, stuffing their pockets with the same risk to life 
ll Choose your approach: sneak in the shadows, or use countless tricks reserves the corpses of 
those who fell under the arm 
ll incredible dive: Explore gloomy town in search of answers to the mysterious events of the past 
ll Gripping story: diabolical intrigue and confrontation, threatening to destroy the whole world 

   
[About repack]

ll release is based on the Thief - Master Thief Edition  
ll Removed voice except Russian and English / no recoded 
ll Independent choice of language and voice text 
ll Additional content: The Bank Heist / The Moira Asylum (The Forsaken) - Challenge Map /Booster Pack - Opportunist / Booster Pack - Predator / Booster Pack - Ghost
ll Installation time ~ 14 min.
